main: ^Water wizard: I am the water wizard, wizard of water
^Lemme guess, thats why youre in the blue area?
^What do you know about Lilac Butterfly
info: ^Water wizard: The moth girl? Shes not an issue anymore.
info2: ^Water wizard: She lost everything in the war. but she will get it back. I know that much
info3: ^Water wizard: Yes! it was a grueling battle between us and the slide people. Our one loss.
